name: Cookie

unions.name: ConsentError
unions.comment: A domain could be prohibited from being embedded for two reasons, either the user has not censented to the type of cookies that the host uses, or we have no information about a host. Since cookies are opt-in by law, we have to disable any unknown hosts since we cannot garantee that the host won't place any cookies not allowed by the user.

unions.name: Host
unions.comment: Internal type that holds data about which hosts (domains) that the user has accepted cookies from.

values.name: decoder
values.comment: Decodes 2 keys into the list of hosts, `allGroups` must include the data from `window.Optanon?.GetDomainData?.().Groups` and `activeGroupIdsString` must include the data from `OptanonActiveGroups`.

values.name: defaultHosts
values.comment: An empty list serves as the list of hosts before the data has been initialized through the port.

values.name: hasGivenConsent
values.comment: Determine of the host's cookies have been accepted
